previewArticle.title: Chivas USA vs. LA Galaxy | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Chivas USA 0, LA Galaxy 3 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: What is billed as the last SuperClásico kicks off Sunday afternoon at StubHub Center when Chivas USA entertain their in-house rivals, the LA Galaxy.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Chivas USA vs. LA Galaxy

timelineItems.desc: Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) receives a cross inside the box from Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy), but does not shoot successfully.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Gyasi Zardes with great opportunity off a cross, but cannot capitalize

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Félix Borja (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Omar González (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 10' Decent crowd here for #TheLastClasico. #LAGalaxy SGs in the NW end are the lowest so far. Bet this will get loud after the first goal.

timelineItems.name: Jane
timelineItems.text: La galaxy v chivas soccer game #lagalaxy #soccer

timelineItems.name: Sean Steffen
timelineItems.text: Can't tell if Coker is bossing Sarvas or the Galaxy are just being lazy. Lots of long balls to Gordinho #CHVvLA ##lagalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy) header from very close range is high and wide to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Alan Gordon heads it wide off a Donovan cross

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: NRC is pointing, directing passes, imbuing a direction that Chivas hasn't really had in the center of midfield #superclasico

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy) header from very close range is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Landon Donovan with a cross.
Foul by Juninho (LA Galaxy).
Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Sean Steffen
timelineItems.text: Baggi is the man. Crucial recovery #lagalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Félix Borja (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Retire from professional soccer... Get a surfboard from your fellow-LA rivals. #SuperClasico #ThanksLD

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Glorious afternoon for some soccer in the friendly confines of #StubHubCenter. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Alex Payne
timelineItems.text: At my first (and possibly my last super clasico. Let go Galaxy!!! #LAGalaxy #ChivasUSA #ChivasSuck #thelastclásico #superclásico

timelineItems.name: Marco Shepherd
timelineItems.text: #galaxy #lagalaxy #la #futbol

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Focused on three points. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Preema De Vera
timelineItems.text: DAY 64: supporting the #lagalaxy at an "away" game. #ILovemyGMen #stubhubcenter #superclasico #beattheggoats #100DaysOfHappiness

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Akira Kaji (Chivas USA).
Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.text: I think the #lagalaxy are going to have 65+% possesion, and Rogers will have 7 + crosses. #CHVvLA #mls

timelineItems.name: Amber Lenette Herrera
timelineItems.text: Stubhub #chivas#lagalaxy#soccer

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Dan Kennedy.

timelineItems.name: Eddie Magana
timelineItems.text: The very LAST #SuperClasico!! 😥😪 Chivas USA v LA Galaxy 😈⚽️🐐 wouldn't miss it for the world! #FearTheGoat 😈⚽️🐐🙌 #LAGalaxy #MLS #ILoveSoccer #Soccer

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: I believe we're now at 8 hours of gametime since @cdchivasusa last scored a goal. #MoreDMidsPlease #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: W. Knutt Megg Esq.
timelineItems.text: Why so few #SuperClasico jokes? A) All used up B) Not funny anymore C) Nobody's watching D) All of the above E) Out of respect for history

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Baggio Husidic.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: The @UnionUltras with a "This is Los Angeles" banner on the South section of the stadium. #TheLastClasico #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Mario Peligroso
timelineItems.text: Time for Donovan and the LA Galaxy to own this #SuperClasico! Let's go LA!

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA captain @1DanKennedy will wear a special armband tonight. Find out more: http://t.co/cYhtvc4JF7 #MLS http://t.co/fVhN3afqW8

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Looks like @landondonovan is going to get a new surfboard. Does Landon Surf? #LAGalaxy #MLS

timelineItems.text: Carlos Bocanegra presents a surfboard and skateboard to Landon Donovan, Chivas USA is giving him a trip to Cabo San Lucas. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.text:
And we’re off at #StubHubCenter!

timelineItems.name: chivasusa
timelineItems.text: #TheLastClasico is now underway! | Ya arrancamos el ultimo SuperClásico! #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Remember when people were talking NRC for #usmnt? In 15 minutes w. Chivas he has been a gamechanger. #SuperClasico

timelineItems.name: Nick Wright
timelineItems.text: What a shot from Sarvas #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Big GJP
timelineItems.text: How in the world can we have such consistently poor corners?!?! #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Mike Standish
timelineItems.text: I would watch a web documentary on being a #ChivasUSA fan. There aren't many of them, but they seem to have fun, despite it all. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The @LAGalaxy are really pressing. Dan Gargan is outworking everyone. Unlucky not to have found something yet. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: erika moreno casillas🌸
timelineItems.text:
@10landondonovan Love you!

timelineItems.desc: What was billed as the last SuperClásico kicked off Sunday afternoon at StubHub Center when Chivas USA entertained their in-house rivals, the LA Galaxy.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Chivas USA vs. LA Galaxy | August 31, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: A walk in the park for @LAGalaxy. #CHVvLA Highlights: http://t.co/bPlBTsBD9V http://t.co/dfgIJbmj12

timelineItems.name: Tim Donahoe
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxyvsChivasUSA #LAGalaxy Is it time for another Zardes goal yet?

timelineItems.name: Raul Peña
timelineItems.text: Husudic better get subbed ... #LAGalaxy fresh legs in the 60-65th minute

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy).
Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Gargan looked like he got the ball. Elfath isn’t having it. Foul to Chivas USA. #LAGalaxy

Foul by Andrew Jean-Baptiste (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Alan Gordon taken down on a great move. Yellow Card to Jean-Baptiste. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA’s Jean-Baptiste goes into the referee’s naughty book for tripping Alan Gordon. Which isn’t allowed in soccer. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Alejandra Almaraz📷📚🔟♉💚
timelineItems.text: Sunday fun day with the family :) #Galaxy vs #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA #138 #ElUltimoClasico

timelineItems.name: Christopher Dwyer
timelineItems.text: Galaxy's looking like garbage so far. Not impressed. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Landon Donovan.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy supporters are definitely making a lot more noise than Chivas USA’s tarps. http://t.co/vt6Kkq16Y9

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Juninho.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Juninho, Sarvas, Gonzalez, Rogers all with long range shots. Trying to beat a bunkered defense. Pull them out away from the goal. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Like, on a made-up scale going up to 10, Rosales was maybe a 6, but the team now is at a 1 on set piece ability.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Banners from @UnionUltras: "We support passion. You support Fashion." #TheLastClasico

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Although it can be argued that Rosales didn't have as big an impact on set pieces as CUSA were hoping for, the team's options now are dire.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: There’s the guy in the 22 shirt who plays for the @LAGalaxy, and he’s playing some great defense to start this game. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Bruce Arena wasting no time as Robbie Keane is already warming up near the #LAGalaxy bench. #TheLastClasico #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Sylvia Castro
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA trying to #tifo #CHVvLA #OurCityOurHome @LAGalaxy #LAGalaxy http://t.co/OThDRrrIkN

timelineItems.desc: Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy) header from inside the box is saved
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Dan Kennedy leaps for Alan Gordon header with incredible reflexes

timelineItems.comment: Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jhon Kennedy Hurtado (Chivas USA).
Attempt blocked. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: The #LastClasicoEver is underway. If Chivas USA players can't get up for this one then they can't get up for anything! #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Akira Kaji (Chivas USA).
Attempt saved. Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Landon Donovan.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Dan Kennedy.

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: For the record, in 2013, they were at a 0, because they also couldn't convert PKs.

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: Pretty solid start for Chivas, good combinations between Borja and Torres and Nigel Reo-Coker has had an impressive debut so far. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Dan Gargan with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: Galaxy though not doing enough to break down Chivas' two banks of four. Need to see more from Rogers and Sarvas offensively. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@1DanKennedy is how. RT @LAGalaxy: HOW IS THIS STILL 0-0? #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Soriano, David
timelineItems.text: LA Galaxy Looking Really Dangerous!!! #follow @TagsForLikes #f4f #followme #TagsForLikes #TFLers #followforfollow #follow4follow #teamfollowback #followher #followbackteam #followhim #followall #followalways #followback #me #love #pleasefollow #follows #follower #following #igers #spamforspam #me #ChivasUSA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: DK showed up to play today, thankfully. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: ThreeForAWin
timelineItems.text: It's organized chaos inside the #ChivasUSA area. #LAGalaxy #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: John Bava III
timelineItems.text: Gordon almost made it 3 games in a row if not for an acrobatic save by Kennedy. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Maser Condos
timelineItems.text: LA GALAXY! #lagalaxy #masercondos

timelineItems.name: Sean Steffen
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA, much like Klinsmann's USA, is sitting back with 3 holding mids-- one with the freedom to push forward #LAGalaxy #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Glad to see Rogers get healthy enough to start. He's had a few chances so far. #LAGalaxy CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Brandon Jarratt
timelineItems.text: one more reason I have a soft spot for Chivas USA: Dan “the Great Wall of Carson” Kennedy #SuperClasico #CHVvLA

Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Husidic sees yellow but the #LAGalaxy midfielder and Arena are furious at Elfath for giving that caution. Looked soft?

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: NRC is dictating flow, shape of chivas team but the problem remains the same as the team: goals #SuperClasico

timelineItems.name: Melinda
timelineItems.text: #Donovan #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: thegfranco
timelineItems.text: Possibly the #last #LA #Classico #working #ChivasUSA vs #LAGalaxy #game #MLS #wfd #worldfootballdaily #forzafutbol #ilovethisjob #stubhubcenter #LandonslastClassico #LandonRetiring

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: So far Alan Gordon and Gyasi Zardes have been running to the same spot. It’s early. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: If that Cubo free kick had been sped up to 1.5 speed, it might've fooled Penedo.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, LA Galaxy 1. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Gyasi Zardes one-touch stinger slots into the far post

timelineItems.name: Kalyssa Serrano
timelineItems.text: #lagalaxy #soccer

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Did I just see AJB push a #lagalaxy player off the ball? Not the sort of thing I'd do if I was already sitting a on yellow. #SuperClasico

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 41' GYASI ZARDES GOAL! Loud cheers erupt from the Chivas USA home crowd as the #LAGalaxy take the lead.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Last year’s Zardes tries to hit that as hard as he can. Robbie Keane has had such a great influence over him. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA).
Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: ThreeForAWin
timelineItems.text: Zardes has gotten so good, he now has instinct in his arsenal. That was class right there. #LAGalaxy #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Gyasi Zardes is starting to blow my mind. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: For those keeping track at home: That’s @landondonovan’s 128th @MLS assist. Seven shy of the all-time record. #CHVvLA http://t.co/9JpUXdLP0A

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: Gyasi Zardes is just a formality for a #USMNT call-up in January at this point, right? Or even October? #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Chivas is stringing more passes together in midfield but the balls aren't making it up to the forwards/ attack 1/3 is low. #SuperClasico

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Reo-Coker has been yelling, angrily clapping, at his teammates a lot in this first half. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Zardes now tied (again) with Dempsey as the top-scoring Americans in MLS in 2014. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is blocked. Assisted by Baggio Husidic.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Zardes is "Demolition Man", literally. @LAGalaxy take the 1-0 lead. #CHVvLA #SuperClasico http://t.co/fT2EWDl7uA

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Chivas is losing the ball too easily. A lot of unforced errors. Team--defenders in particular--need to stop the long balls #SuperClasico

timelineItems.desc: Offside, LA Galaxy. Landon Donovan tries a through ball, but Alan Gordon is caught offside.
timelineItems.title: OFFSIDE: Omar Gonzalez goal off free kick called back

timelineItems.comment: Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jhon Kennedy Hurtado (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: 45+ Landon Donovan crows the free kick foul. 30 yards out. Left Center. LA looking to put a period on this period. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: GOOOOOOOOOoooooooffsides #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Landon Donovan tries a through ball, but Alan Gordon is caught offside.
First Half ends, Chivas USA 0, LA Galaxy 1.

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA have just passed the 500 scoreless minutes mark.

timelineItems.name: Marco Shepherd
timelineItems.text: #galaxy #chivasusa #galaxy 1 #chivasusa 0

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: What a great set piece. Bad awareness on Gordon's part causes it to be called back for offside however. Damn that wouldve been nice. #CHVvLA

timelineItems.text: GOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAAALLLLLLLLLL GYASI ZARDES! 1-0! #TheLastClasico #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Get goals early, lay the counter and gradually get the big players subbed out. Still have a cluttered schedule coming up. #LAGalaxy #CHVvLA

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Torres bumped heads with Leonardo. He’s on the side of the field ready to come back on. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Alan Gordon is confident with his feet. Having lived through his 1st stint with LA, this astounds me. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Paul Wilson
timelineItems.text: How many pinkie rings do you think Joe Tutino owns? #LAGalaxy #CHVvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Nigel Reo-Coker (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Erick Torres.

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: While he's been a bit of a misfit for most of the season, Husidic has been impressive recently. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Omar González.

timelineItems.name: Felix Osorio
timelineItems.text:
It's so hot where I'm sitting but it's worth it since its game time 😄😄
#Galaxy#chivasusa#heatwave#letsgogalaxy

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Cubo almost singlehandedly created magic there. He had no space and almost did something anyway.
